create_entry.default:
On Android, open [the OwnTracks app]({android_url}), go to Preferences > Connection. Change the following settings:
 - Mode: HTTP
 - Host: {webhook_url}
 - Identification:
   - Username: `'(Your name)'`
   - Device ID: `'(Your device name)'`

On iOS, open [the OwnTracks app]({ios_url}), tap (i) icon in top left > Settings. Change the following settings:
 - Mode: HTTP
 - URL: {webhook_url}
 - Turn on authentication
 - UserID: `'(Your name)'`

{secret}

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for more information.
